Posts.Content: natstar wrote: Yesterday I had bmx and diep. The breast surgeon took out 5 sentinel nodes. She found one was hard meaning I don't just have dcis as originally found.The plastic surgeon still did the diep but now I have to do radiation. Final diagnosis com in g Nov 7. I'm just so hurt and sad. I don't know what to do. Sorry I am on pain meds right now. Log in to post a reply
